actions.name: CreateLifecyclePolicy
actions.description: Create a data lifecycle policy to manage the scheduled creation and retention of Amazon EBS snapshots. You may have up to 100 policies.

actions.name: DeleteLifecyclePolicy
actions.description: Delete an existing data lifecycle policy. In addition, this action halts the creation and deletion of snapshots that the policy specified. Existing snapshots are not affected.

actions.name: GetLifecyclePolicies
actions.description: Returns a list of summary descriptions of data lifecycle policies.

actions.name: GetLifecyclePolicy
actions.description: Returns a complete description of a single data lifecycle policy.

actions.name: ListTagsForResource
actions.description: Grants permission to list the tags associated with a resource.

actions.name: TagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to add or update tags of a resource.

actions.name: UntagResource
actions.description: Grants permission to remove associated with a resource.

actions.name: UpdateLifecyclePolicy
actions.description: Updates an existing data lifecycle policy.
